body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

@arjun-raj-kuppala  @haampie  @srekolam

If needed I can create single issues for each of the packages…

```console
$ cat /localscratch/rocm-4.3.1.yaml
spack:
  concretization: separately
  packages:
    all:
      compiler: [gcc@11.2.0]
  specs:
  - matrix:
    - ['%gcc@11.2.0^cmake@3.19.7']
    - [atmi@4.3.1, comgr@4.3.1, hip@4.3.1, hipblas@4.3.1, hipcub@4.3.1, hipfft@4.3.1,
      hipfort@4.3.1, hipify-clang@4.3.1, hip-rocclr@4.3.1, hipsparse@4.3.1, hsakmt-roct@4.3.1,
      hsa-rocr-dev@4.3.1, llvm-amdgpu@4.3.1, migraphx@4.3.1, miopengemm@4.3.1, miopen-hip@4.3.1,
      miopen-opencl@4.3.1, mivisionx@4.3.1, rccl@4.3.1, rdc@4.3.1, rocalution@4.3.1,
      rocblas@4.3.1, rocfft@4.3.1, rocm-bandwidth-test@4.3.1, rocm-clang-ocl@4.3.1,
      rocm-cmake@4.3.1, rocm-dbgapi@4.3.1, rocm-debug-agent@4.3.1, rocm-gdb@4.3.1,
      rocminfo@4.3.1, rocm-opencl@4.3.1, rocm-smi-lib@4.3.1, rocm-tensile@4.3.1, rocm-validation-suite@4.3.1,
      rocprim@4.3.1, rocprofiler-dev@4.3.1, rocrand@4.3.1, rocsolver@4.3.1, rocsparse@4.3.1,
      rocthrust@4.3.1, roctracer-dev@4.3.1]                                                                                        # rocm-device-libs@4.3.1,
  view: true

$ spack env create -d /localscratch/2021-09-10_rocm-4.3.1 /localscratch/rocm-4.3.1.yaml

$ spack env activate /localscratch/2021-09-10_rocm-4.3.1/

$ spack install -j 50
```
